title: Christopher Lee - Charlemagne: The Omens Of Death (2013) 320kbps
description:
A heavy metal concept album by actor and singer Christopher Lee, released on 27 May, 2013. It is a sequel to his debut album Charlemagne: By the Sword and the Cross (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8487059/Christopher_Lee_-_By_the_Sword_and_the_Cross_(2010)_FLAC). The music was arranged by Judas Priest's Richie Faulkner, and features World Guitar Idol Champion Hedras Ramos.
